title: ArtyTorrent Pack 99-ReFX Nexus-Analog Expansion-AMPLiFY
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 97-ReFX Nexus-Bass Expansion-AMPLiFY
-----------------------------------------------------

This is another superb addition to the ReFX Nexus synth. 128 analog sounds including amazing emulations of the Benny Benassi and Bodyroxx bass sounds.
Thanks to AMPLifY for initial rip.

You must have a working version of Nexus 1.3.9 in order for this pack to work. I uploaded the Windows installation update in pack 96.

To install the ROMs...

UnRAR to create a disk image.
Mount it with PowerISO.
Open Nexus in your sequencer.
click on the SYS tab (on the right of the virtual LCD).
Clik on "import exp".
Browse to the nxp on your virtual drive.

Once the ROMs have been copied to your usual Nexus directory, find the new presets with the LIBRARY tab.


It has come to my attention that ReFX uses agents to aggressively chase and intimidate filesharers, so feel free to upload this elsewhere to make it difficult for them to keep track of sources. 
More expansions will be uploaded in due course. Please seed for the benefit of all.

--
Arty - "Lawyers must not be allowed to dictate our freedom to share."
2nd March 2008
